title: David Remnick: Putin would ‘love to see us fail’
description:
Tensions between Russia and the West remain high but what happens next is something of a mystery — in part because Vladimir Putin’s playbook is designed to be unpredictable.

David Remnick, the editor of the New Yorker, author and former Moscow correspondent, talks to Chuck about what might be motivating the Russian president.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
